channel.title: I keep crashing
channel.description: I know that I am talking about the client, but I don't think this is client based. No matter what client I use, if I take 2 steps, my client crashes on me. I think this may be a computer problem with how I set up my java. If anyone can give some insight on what I may have done that may be causing this problem, please let me know.
